location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2787 of 1853 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary of the Government, Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement by Malet of Kemball's earlier letter (folio 126), informing Kemball that the 'amicable arrangements' between His Hignhess the Sultan of Muscat, Syud Soweynee [Thuwaini bin Said], and Abdoolla bin Fysul [Abdullah bin Faisal] is satisfactory.
